function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High energy use in unoccupied buildings","Impact":"Increases energy costs and consumption, contributes to environmental impact","Mitigation":"Implement automated energy management systems, conduct regular energy audits","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, smart thermostats, energy-efficient lighting","People":"Building owners, facility managers, energy auditors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Energy performance gap in buildings","Impact":"Inefficient use of resources, higher operating costs, environmental impact","Mitigation":"Improve building commissioning, conduct post-occupancy evaluations, invest in energy-efficient systems","Technologies":"Building energy management systems, continuous commissioning tools, energy modeling software","People":"Building owners, energy managers, building operators","Owner":"Building owners, energy managers"},{"Description":"Lack of research on actual energy performance of buildings","Impact":"Limited understanding of energy use patterns, missed opportunities for optimization","Mitigation":"Conduct in-depth energy performance studies, promote research collaboration, develop industry benchmarks","Technologies":"Building energy modeling, data analytics tools, energy monitoring systems","People":"Research organizations, building owners, energy consultants","Owner":"Research organizations, building owners"}]}
